Posts.Content: Hi Judith Thank you for sharing I have just joined a gym and enjoy aqua arobics. Once I build up my fitness level I will do other classes. Kirby x

Posts.Content: Hi Cloecat45  Thank you for your suggestions I will definitely give it ago.
Posts.Title: suggestions on losing weight

Posts.Content: Hello I am new to the group after many months searching the Internet without success of finding away of losing weight while on Tamoxifen.   I excerise three times a week eat well and I still can't loose the extra 1.5 stones I gained over the last year . I am embrassed to consult my doctor as I know how lucky I am to have recovered so well and in the great scheme of things it's not that big but I have lost confidence and cover up all the time which my daughter says makes me look bigger. I get hot flushes to the point of wetting through my many layers. I heard that Apple cider vinager and raspberry kitones will help but I am scared of combining with tamoxifen  Can anyone help
Posts.Title: suggestions on losing weight

Posts.Content: Hello R It's so good to know I  am not alone I wish I joined this group a long time ago.  I will call my doctor's surgery and book a telephone consultation.  Thanks for sharing about the rehabilitation program I will conduct some research  Good luck with your appointment tomorrow  Thank you for your encouragement  Kirby
